revision.text:
{{menutrail|Main menu|New game menu|Class selection menu|Episode selection menu}} [[File:SkillSelection.png|thumb|The skill selection menu in [[Hacx]].]]The '''skill selection menu''' is displayed when starting a new game if there are more than one skill defined in [[MAPINFO]]; unless the previously selected episode has in its [[episode definition]] the <tt>NoSkillMenu</tt> keyword. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is <tt>SkillMenu</tt>.
It is the last [[new game menu]], following the [[class selection menu]] and the [[episode selection menu]]. [[Category:Menus]]
